name: TOASTERDOG IN DREAMWORLD
description:
Your shift as the Toaster Dog has started, yet you yearn for the appreciation you deserve for your passionate work. It's time to go ask the boss for a raise!!

Do you want to water the flowers today?

Apologies in advance for high likelihood of game crashes/freezing and other errors. RPGmaker was pushed to it's limit with this project.

Demo playtime averages just under 2 hours.
